title: FindaDr
description: Full stack  web application. The purpose of the app is to deliver a app that will locate doctors based on location requested. This app will allow user profiles to be created and also implement a calendar to keep track of your visits.

title: RU Reviewer
description: There's a lot to do / eat / see / play at Rutgers. This app provides effective way to search for them. Built with NodeJs and templated with HandlebarsJS

title: Blog Platform
description: Blog platform built on NodeJS includes login/ registration, password encryption. Logged user can add, delete and update post. Storing data with MongoDb, and rendering with Handlebars. Also includes a scraper for pulling data from other sources.

title: MoviesJQ
description: Front end project built with Javascript, JQuery, AJAX, HTML, CSS, MaterializeCSS and TMDB api.
